question: (Cheryl of the Clue Crew reports from the Hall of Ocean Life at the American Museum of Natural History.)  One of the iconic exhibits in the Hall of Ocean Life is the coral reef diorama near a 30-times enlarged model of one of these creatures that make up reefs
